description:
Company Description
  Do you want to be part of our successful Real Estate team supporting top clients for Turner & Townsend in Ottawa? We are hiring an ambitious and forward thinking Administrative Assistant to support our team in the Ottawa office.
  At Turner & Townsend we’re passionate about making the difference. That means delivering better outcomes for our clients, helping our people to realize their potential, and doing our part to create a prosperous society.
  Our team is dynamic, innovative and client-focused. Our clients value our proactive approach, depth of expertise, integrity and the quality we deliver. As a result our people get to work on some of the most exciting projects in the world
  Who are you?
  You are an Administrative Assistant with a minimum of 5 years of experience in an administrative support role. You are comfortable liaising with senior internal and external stakeholders.
 
 

 Job Description
  You will be key in supporting the operations and administration for the office, supporting the Cost Centre Lead in Ottawa:
 
   Support Turner & Townsend’s ‘Bid to Win’ process for all pursuits within the Canadian business, ensuring engaged participation from directors and SMEs to achieve a high-quality deliverable.
   Support with meetings (book boardroom rooms, prepare and distribute documents, action items) for various internal meetings.
   Take minutes/action items in meetings
   Follow up with Management/Team on developing agendas and distributing/preparing documents.
   Raising invoices and purchase orders
   Supporting with document control – Quality Assurance & Quality Control
   Prepare record of discussions by taking notes and picking out appropriate action items.
   Assisting in the preparation of reports
   Assist the Cost Centre Lead managing aspects of their calendar, booking flights and accommodation, etc.
 
 
 

 Qualifications
  
 
   Excellent written and verbal communication skills
   Experience in business administrative settings and meetings with Senior Management present.
   Document Controls experience highly desirable
   Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
   Proactive behaviour, showing initiative and being action oriented.
   Monitors progress and quality of work, making adjustments as needed to meet and exceed expectations.
   Well-mannered and professional and team player in a high profile environment.
   Able to utilise all Office 365 tools at the intermediate level.
   Microsoft Visio would be advantageous
 
  Essential Experience/Qualifications
 
   Minimum 5 years of experience in an administrative support role
   Post-secondary education certificate, diploma or degree preferred
   Experience in consultancy strongly preferred
   Bilingual with French & English is an asset
   Ability to be granted a Level 1 security clearance
 
  Additional Information
  Our inspired people share our vision and mission. We provide a great place to work, where each person has the opportunity and voice to affect change.
  We want our people to succeed both in work and life. To support this we promote a healthy, productive and flexible working environment that respects work-life balance.
  Turner & Townsend is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and actively encourage applications from all sectors of the community.
  Please find out more about us at www.turnerandtownsend.com/
  #LI-Hybrid
 
  Join our social media conversations for more information about Turner & Townsend and our exciting future projects:
  Twitter
  Instagram
  LinkedIn 
  It is strictly against Turner & Townsend policy for candidates to pay any fee in relation to our recruitment process. No recruitment agency working with Turner & Townsend will ask candidates to pay a fee at any time.
  Any unsolicited resumes/CVs submitted through our website or to Turner & Townsend personal e-mail accounts, are considered property of Turner & Townsend and are not subject to payment of agency fees. In order to be an authorised Recruitment Agency/Search Firm for Turner & Townsend, there must be a formal written agreement in place and the agency must be invited, by the Recruitment Team, to submit candidates for review.
